about.title: ABOUT VOLKOFF
about.description: VOLKOFF was born from the rebellion against conventional fashion. We create bold, uncompromising pieces that challenge the status quo. Our designs embrace raw aesthetics and industrial influences, representing the voice of those who refuse to be silenced.
about.mission: Our mission is to redefine fashion as a form of resistance, creating pieces that empower the wearer and provoke thought.

item1.name: Afgana jacket
item1.descr: Cordura material, water-repellent fabric, IR (infrared protection) drones will not see you. The jacket is for real veterans of the Afghan kush, the texture of the fabric resembles burnt lungs. Be ready to declare war on your addiction.

item2.name: MV Calf Skin Jacket
item2.descr: Material, Genuine calf leather, feel like a real cowboy in the wild west of Moscow

item3.name: FedEx anorak
item3.descr: Material, Cordura, Water-repellent texture, resistant to winds. Anorak for lovers of wall painting and street movement😁

item4.name: DRT Black jeans
item4.descr: Material, Japanese denim (Kurabo) Classic straight cut. The fabric is faded and dirty, as if you spent a week in the sands of Arizona in these jeans. You'll look like Daniel Craig from the movie Cowboys vs Aliens.

item5.name: DRT Oliva jeans
item5.descr: Material, Japanese denim (Kurabo) Classic straight cut with low flaring at the bottom. The fabric lay for 2 days in a swampy area. For lovers of forest treasures

item6.name: DRT Blue punk jeans
item6.descr: The material is Japanese denim (kurabo) with a classic straight cut. The legendary pale blue color and the color of mud. Always be a young punk, capable of anything. Fall down and get up, and it doesn't matter what you're wearing.

item10.name: Sporto duffle bag
item10.descr: A large bag for any purpose, travel, painting, escape, harvesting. Made in the general style of things.
